level.text: A licensee under this chapter shall conduct himself or herself professionally at all times.
Make a threat against or inflict bodily harm upon boxing officials or members of the boxing public;
Make allegations against boxing officials which a licensee knows or should know are false;
Take part, or agree to take part, in an arrangement by which a contestant is to engage, or does engage, in any fake or sham contest or dishonest exhibition of the contestant’s skills;
Wager or gamble on any contest; or
Engage in any other unprofessional conduct.
